name: enzyme

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean && npm run docs:publish
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.test:all: npm run react:13 && npm test && npm run react:14 && npm test
scripts.react:13: npm run react:clean && npm i react@0.13
scripts.react:14: npm run react:clean && npm i react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git fetch https://github.com/airbnb/enzyme.git gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push https://github.com/airbnb/enzyme.git gh-pages --force

2.4.0.deprecated: shallow rendering has a bug when experimental lifecycle support is off. try 2.4.1 or higher!
